verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time, while he was yet <S%H5750><s%> shut <S%H6113><s%> up in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison, <S%H4307><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> the maker <S%H6213><s%> thereof, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that formed <S%H3335><s%> it, to establish <S%H3559><s%> it; the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is his name; <S%H8034><s%>
Call <S%H7121><s%> to me, and I will answer <S%H6030><s%> you, and show <S%H5046><s%> you great <S%H1419><s%> and mighty <S%H1219><s%> things, which you know <S%H3045><s%> not.

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and concerning <S%H5921><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> which are thrown <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> by the mounts, <S%H5550><s%> and by the sword; <S%H2719><s%>

They come <S%H935><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> but it is to fill <S%H4390><s%> them with the dead <S%H6297><s%> bodies <S%H6297><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I have slain <S%H5221><s%> in my anger <S%H639><s%> and in my fury, <S%H2534><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> wickedness <S%H7451><s%> I have hid <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from this <S%H2063><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will bring <S%H4608><s%> it health <S%H724><s%> and cure, <S%H4832><s%> and I will cure <S%H7495><s%> them, and will reveal <S%H1540><s%> to them the abundance <S%H6283><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> and truth. <S%H571><s%>

And I will cause the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to return, <S%H7725><s%> and will build <S%H1129><s%> them, as at the first. <S%H7223><s%>

And I will cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them from all <S%H3605><s%> their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against me; and I will pardon <S%H5545><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> they have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and whereby <S%H834><s%> they have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me.

And it shall be to me a name <S%H8034><s%> of joy, <S%H8342><s%> a praise <S%H8416><s%> and an honor <S%H8597><s%> before all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> that I do <S%H6213><s%> to them: and they shall fear <S%H6342><s%> and tremble <S%H7264><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the goodness <S%H2896><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> the prosperity <S%H7965><s%> that I procure <S%H6213><s%> to it.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Again <S%H5750><s%> there shall be heard <S%H8085><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you say <S%H559><s%> shall be desolate <S%H2717><s%> without <S%H369><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> even in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and in the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> that are desolate, <S%H8074><s%> without <S%H369><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> inhabitant, <S%H3427><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%>

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of joy, <S%H8342><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of gladness, <S%H8057><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the bridegroom, <S%H2860><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the bride, <S%H3618><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of them that shall say, <S%H559><s%> Praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is good; <S%H2896><s%> for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endures for ever: <S%H5769><s%> and of them that shall bring <S%H935><s%> the sacrifice of praise <S%H8426><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%> For I will cause to return <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> as at the first, <S%H7223><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> Again <S%H5750><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> which is desolate <S%H2717><s%> without <S%H369><s%> <S%H5704><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> <S%H5704><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof, shall be an habitation <S%H5116><s%> of shepherds <S%H7462><s%> causing their flocks <S%H6629><s%> to lie <S%H7257><s%> down. <S%H7901><s%>

In the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the vale, <S%H8219><s%> and in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the south, <S%H5045><s%> and in the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and in the places about <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> shall the flocks <S%H6629><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> under <S%H5921><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of him that tells <S%H4487><s%> them, said <S%H559><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that I will perform <S%H6965><s%> that good <S%H2896><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have promised <S%H1696><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

In those <S%H1992><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and at that time, <S%H6256><s%> will I cause the Branch <S%H6780><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> up to David; <S%H1732><s%> and he shall execute <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

In those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall Judah <S%H3063><s%> be saved, <S%H3467><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> safely: <S%H983><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> is the name with which <S%H834><s%> she shall be called, <S%H7121><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> our righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> shall never <S%H3808><s%> want <S%H3772><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> to sit <S%H3427><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> want <S%H3772><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me to offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, and to kindle <S%H6999><s%> meat offerings, <S%H4503><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> continually. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you can break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the day, <S%H3117><s%> and my covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the night, <S%H3915><s%> and that there should not be day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> in their season; <S%H6256><s%>

Then may also <S%H1571><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> be broken <S%H6565><s%> with David <S%H1732><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> that he should not have <S%H1961><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> to reign <S%H4427><s%> on his throne; <S%H3678><s%> and with the Levites <S%H3881><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> my ministers. <S%H8334><s%>

As the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> be numbered, <S%H5608><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> measured: <S%H4058><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will I multiply <S%H7235><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> that minister <S%H8334><s%> to me.
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Consider <S%H7200><s%> you not what <S%H4100><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> have spoken, <S%H1696><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The two <S%H8147><s%> families <S%H4940><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has chosen, <S%H977><s%> he has even cast <S%H3988><s%> them off? thus they have despised <S%H5006><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> that they should be no more <S%H5750><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> If <S%H518><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> be not with day <S%H3119><s%> and night, <S%H3915><s%> and if I have not appointed <S%H7760><s%> the ordinances <S%H2708><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth; <S%H776><s%>

Then <S%H1571><s%> will I cast <S%H3988><s%> away the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>and David <S%H1732><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> so that I will not take <S%H3947><s%> any of his seed <S%H2233><s%> to be rulers <S%H4910><s%> over <S%H413><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3446><s%> and Jacob: <S%H3290><s%> for I will cause their captivity <S%H7622><s%> to return, <S%H7725><s%> and have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on them.
